XEP-0085: Entity Capabilities

Verification String

Constructor

new(hash : String, node : String, ver : String, ?ext : String)

Instance Variables

ext : String

A set of nametokens specifying additional feature bundles. This attribute is deprecated!

hash : String

The hashing algorithm used to generate the verification string, fe: sha-1.

node : String

A URI that uniquely identifies a software application, typically a URL at the website of the project or company that produces the software

ver : String

A string that is used to verify the identity and supported features of the entity
